thag5.6:0.4_0: Right away he applied himself against the river Aciravatī
thag5.6:1.1_0: It was truly for my benefit
thag5.6:1.2_0: that the Buddha went to the river Nerañjara.
thag5.6:2.1_0: I used to perform a diverse spectrum of sacrifices;
thag5.6:2.4_0: I was a blind, ordinary person.
thag5.6:3.1_0: Caught in the thicket of wrong view,
thag5.6:4.3_0: I serve the truly worthy flame:
thag5.6:4.4_0: I bow to the Realized One.
thag5.6:5.2_0: craving for continued existence is shattered;
thag5.6:5.4_0: Now there is no further existence.”
